titles.title: Humanitarian Family Unity Act of 1987
A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to waive the continuous residence requirement under the legalization program for spouses and children of qualified legalized aliens.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

bill.summary: 6/23/1987--Introduced. Humanitarian Family Unity Act of 1987 - Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to waive the continuous residence requirement under the legalization program for spouses and children of legalized aliens.
